editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Dryer, Freezer, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator, Washer
editedFacts.rooms: Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Library, Master bath, Mud room, Office, Pantry, Recreation room, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription: COMING SOON! NOT LISTED IN MLS yet per sellers request. Private showings available, now. Over 3600 square feet! A lot of house for the money. 10 foot ceilings on all levels. Every bedroom has it's own private bath. Upgrades everywhere! Wider than normal plan w/ 4 beds (all with a private bath), incred kitchen, custom built-ins, walnut floors, 2 level laundry room with sink, stone & granite finishes, superior trim detailing, finished lower level, two balconies plus two patios, stamped concrete, 2 car garage and so much more. A must see! When you enter the front door you will see a study or playroom on your left. As you move through the home you will experience the wonderful flow of the open floor plan......outdoor living space if spacious and low maintenance. Call with questions. Agents, Brokers or potential buyers, call JoEllen Ufner 720-404-4735 Metro Brokers Cherry Creek for a private showing of this Platte park home...Close to restaurants and shopping
response.whatOwnerLoves: Platte Park neighborhood. Gourmet kitchen, 2 balconies, laundry on 2nd level, trey ceilings, see through fireplace, granite Countertops in kitchen and all bathrooms, walnut floors, fully finished basemen, house is pre-wired. Walkability
